sentences.en: Air travellers were left stranded because of icy conditions.
sentences.cn: 飞机乘客因冰冻天气而滞留。

sentences.en: An equipment failure or accident on the moon could have left the astronauts stranded.
sentences.cn: 在月球上如果有一种设备失灵或发生事故,宇航员就会进退失据.

sentences.en: Authorities requisitioned hotel rooms to lodge more than 3,000 stranded Christmas vacationers.
sentences.cn: 当局征用旅馆房间安顿了3,000多名无处落脚的圣诞度假者。

sentences.en: He was stranded on desert island.
He went away leaving his family stranded.
sentences.cn: 他走开了,留下家人毫无办法.

sentences.en: One of the most frustrating experiences in life is to be stranded without proper tools.
sentences.cn: 人生最令人沮丧的经历之一,就是处于窘境而无用以自拔的适当工具.

sentences.en: Rescue services have been working round the clock to free stranded motorists.
sentences.cn: 救援部门一直在日夜不停地工作，解救被困司机。

sentences.en: Stranded wire is usually preferred to solid wire.
sentences.cn: 最好是用多股绞合导线,而不用单股导线.

sentences.en: Stranded, he sat with his back to a tree.
sentences.cn: 他束手无策, 只好靠着一棵树坐下.

sentences.en: The car broke down and we were stranded on a lonely road.
sentences.cn: 汽车坏了,我们被困在一条偏僻的路上.

sentences.en: The climbers had been stranded by a storm.
sentences.cn: 登山者被暴风雨困住了。

sentences.en: They circled round and round the stranded steamer chatting excitedly.
sentences.cn: 两艘汽艇围着搁浅的轮船来回绕圈子,艇上的人正起劲地议论着什么.

sentences.en: They remain stranded in freezing weather and rapidly worsening conditions.
sentences.cn: 他们仍然被困着，天气严寒，情况迅速恶化。

sentences.en: Your men are stranded. The defenders have all the mobility, the numerical superiority, and the firepower.
sentences.cn: 你的人进退两难.但是守军却有全部的机动性, 有数量上的优势和火力上的优势.

words.tran_cn: 使搁浅；使陷于困境；弄断；使落后
[水运]搁浅的；陷于困境的；有…股的（常用来构成复合词）

trans.tran_en: a person or vehicle that is stranded is unable to move from the place where they are

trans.tran_cn: 使滞留，使搁浅( strand的过去式和过去分词 )
